Wow.  I favourited this story not looking into it, only a couple of pages.  Everything seemed fine, however, today I read on to the later pages to see if it's good all the way like it is in the beginning, my, how disappointed I was.  Everything was ok, then boom trash was everywhere.  Art is low-mid, story is cliche and trash, translations are horrendous.  Stories like these always start so good, then the author has a stroke and writes bullshit.  This is pretty trash for any NTR fans as well, cause everything else in general is trash.  0/10

Honestly I don't mind NTR, but at least they can try to be original about it. I'm tired of the trope where they just give in "for his sake" when we ALL know that you're doing it because it feels good. There is only ONE I've EVER read where it doesn't say NTR, but the girl gets fucked and not by the one she loves. Reason it's not NTR is because she NEVER GAVE IN!! THAT is a good story. Yes, it felt good. Felt great. Made her cum over and over and over again. But she never broke and gave into it. She always had her eyes set on the one she loved. She endured for him. The MC wasn't a cuckboi bitch either. He did everything in his power to get her back. He knew what she was going through and didn't just sit around and mope. He didn't just let her get broke. He saved the girl he loved and she came even harder with him than she ever did with the other guy. THAT is an awesome story.
